text: Follower from the time owners started at Aperia Mall. Place at PLQ3 has been refreshed with new menu. Wide selection of craft beers. Good place for lunch meal with colleague or long chat with friend. Ingredients are fresh and worth every cent. Will definitely visit again!

My 3rd visit and decided to try the unagi with rice.  Succulent and delicious.
